caseTitle: Haseen Ullah v. Mst. Naheed Begum & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Columns No.13 and 16 of the Nikkahnama to be interpreted on the basis of the intention between the parties rather than the headings of the columns, in particular when there is a dispute between the value of the dower and items.
